item.title: Welcome
item.description: Welcome everyone to my first “real” blog. =] To set some initial expectations, not all of these posts will be of super high quality published material. Often, I plan to use them for random musings and thoughts which I might have posted somewhere like Twitter, but required a bit more text than fits in a typical tweet. I hope you all enjoy these. And at least when I have some things to say there will be a place I can post and link to that is easier than tweets.
item.content:
Welcome everyone to my first “real” blog. =]

To set some initial expectations, not all of these posts will be of super high quality published material. Often, I plan to use them for random musings and thoughts which I might have posted somewhere like Twitter, but required a bit more text than fits in a typical tweet.

I hope you all enjoy these. And at least when I have some things to say there will be a place I can post and link to that is easier than tweets.
